TextEng: You got that right.
I'm sure Garrick appreciates your efforts.
I should go.
The important thing is he survived.
You are having doubts?
Ever since you left the service of Lathander...?
I cannot advise you in this.
You did not come here expecting spells from Ao, did you? What drew you here in the first place?
Text: 에이오한테서 주문을 기대하고 온 건 아니잖아? 처음엔 뭐 때문에 여기 온 거야?

TextEng: Do you still feel that way?
And what if this is a test of your faith by Ao?
Well, you obviously don't have the faith in Ao you once did.
Text: 분명히 예전처럼 에이오에 대한 신앙이 없는 거네.

TextEng: Maybe magic shouldn't be the answer to everything. Have you thought of that?
Text: 마법이 모든 해답이 아닐 수도 있어. 생각해 봤어?

TextEng: I think you've already answered that question for yourself.
Text: 그 질문에 대한 답은 이미 스스로 찾은 것 같은데.

TextEng: You prayed for Garrick to be well, and now he is. Even that could be a sign.
Text: 가릭이 나아지길 기도했고, 이제 나았어. 그것만으로도 신호일 수 있어.

TextEng: Maybe magic shouldn't be the answer to everything. Have you thought of that?
Text: 마법이 모든 해답이 아닐 수도 있어. 생각해 봤어?

TextEng: If you have such doubts, you are not a true believer in Ao, are you?
Text: 그런 의문이 든다면, 에이오의 진정한 신자가 아니잖아?

TextEng: That's up to you. I can't help you there.
Text: 그건 당신이 결정할 일이야. 나는 도와줄 수 없어.

TextEng: You have failed your god. Give everything you own to me and go make penance.
Text: 당신은 신을 저버렸어. 가진 거 전부 내게 주고 속죄하러 가.

TextEng: I happen to know the Oasis of the Green Palm could use a new cleric of Lathander...
Text: 녹색 야자 오아시스에 라샌더의 새 성직자가 필요하다는데...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade/Convert Valana to your own religion.]</Start> Perhaps it is time for you to follow a new faith.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득/발라나를 당신의 종교로 개종시킵니다.]</Start> 이제 새로운 신앙을 따를 때가 됐을지도.

TextEng: I should go.
Can I ask you some questions?
You look like you have a problem.
